original_text: Then the Pharisees and the leaders of the priests had a meeting with the group of Jewish leaders. They asked each other, ‘What will we do? This man is doing so many miracles.
korean_text: 이에 대제사장들과 바리새인들이 공회를 모으고 이르되 이 사람이 많은 표적을 행하니 우리가 어떻게 하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Then the Pharisees and the leaders of the priests
had a meeting with the group of Jewish leaders
This man is doing so many miracles
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람이 너무 많은 기적을 행하고 있다
